entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Miscou Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miscou Island 09:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: SSE 23 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow this afternoon then to rain mixed with freezing rain later this afternoon. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 to 30 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets late this evening then to snow after midnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
